attacks.name: Hurl
attacks.special: If a Critical Hit is made, the target Character may be thrown D6 inches in a direction of the Troll player's choosing. This Character is Prone.

attacks.name: Smash
attacks.special: If a Critical Hit is rolled, if the target Character is on a smaller base size they become Prone after the Attack has been made.

rules.name: Fungal Regeneration
rules.description: If this Character is not in base contact with an enemy Character at the end of the Round, it regains D6 HP.
